metadata.name: ML001
metadata.description:
The Mona Lisa is possibly the most famous painting in the world.

'When Mona met Lisa' is a series of 10 abstract and experimental interpretations of the famous original based on Michael's current artistic explorations.

An exclusive subscription-only run of ten unreleased pieces by Michael Hughes/michi_p. The pieces will be released on a regular basis to the holder of token #1. In case token #1 changes hands the remaining editions will go to the new holder.

ML001: 1920 x 1080, 25fps, 20sec, H.264, 48.6MB

Michael Hughes 2023
